titleStmt.title: The nonconformist's plea for lay-communion with the Church of England together with a modest defence of ministerial nonconformity, and the exercise of their ministry / by Mr. John Corbet ...
titleStmt.author: Corbet, John, 1620-1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

With: The remains of the reverend and learned Mr. John Corbet, late of Chichester. London : Printed for Thomas Parkhurst ..., 1684 -- An account given of the principles & practices of several nonconformists / written by Mr. John Corbet ... London : Printed for Thomas Parkhurst ..., 1682.
